original_text:
Little Green Men Nova Wilds
Lo spazio e i misteri che si celano nella sua vastità, sono da sempre amati in molti media come libri e film ma stanno prendendo piede anche nel mondo delle slot.
In Little Green Men: Nova Wilds della IGT il tema è quello degli alieni, soprattutto nella loro rappresentazione più comune di esserini verdi muniti di antenne e a bordo di tonde astronavi. Questa slot spicca particolarmente per la sua simpatia, ma ne parliamo meglio nel primo punto della nostra recensione.
Parliamo della grafica di Little Green Men: Nova Wilds.
Little Green Men: Nova Wilds – Grafica da cartone animato
Spesso definire qualcosa come un “cartone animato” significa poco serio e troppo bambinesco, ma in realtà creare una grafica cartoonesca non è cosa da poco in quanto anche nella semplicità di colori sgargianti e forme tondeggianti, si possono trovare delle piccole perle. Ed è il caso di Little Green Men: Nova Wilds.
Questa slot si presenta ambientata nello spazio profondo con il profilo di un pianeta in lontananza, ma la cosa che salta maggiormente all’occhio è la completa assenza di una vera e propria griglia. I simboli sembrano fluttuare nel vuoto. I simboli che scorrono nella griglia di gioco sono oggetti cari alla fantascienza come caschi iper-tecnologici, robottini, super-computer e pistole al laser.
Un dettaglio apprezzabile è la rappresentazione dei tipici simboli delle carte da gioco. Se in molte altre slot questi sono le iniziali (A, K, Q, J) in font spesso piuttosto essenziali, qui sono come intagliate nella roccia di piccoli asteroidi. Solo questo piccolo particolare rende Little Green Men: Nova Wilds diversa dal solito.
Nel mentre un piccolo alieno verde con tre occhi ci accompagnerà durante le giocate con simpatiche animazioni che scatteranno nelle combinazioni speciali.
Fortunatamente anche la parte sonora è molto curata. Musiche e suoni rimandano al tema fantascientifico e cartoonesco della slot senza risultare fastidiosi.
E ora parliamo dell’aspetto invece più tecnico della slot.
Little Green Men: Nova Wilds – Meccaniche di gioco
Arriviamo dunque all’aspetto tecnico vero e proprio di questa slot. Il meccanismo sfruttato da questo titolo della IGT è comune a molte altre slot online. Si tratta di un 5*3 in cui cinque rulli vanno a muoversi lungo tre linee, mostrando quindici simboli a ogni giocata.
Le linee di vincita sono venti e l’RTP è pari a 96,17%, un valore abbastanza comune tra gli standard non solo di questa casa di sviluppo ma del mercato in generale. Se si considera che il valore minimo è pari al 90% e il massimo (che difficilmente viene raggiunto) è del 99%, possiamo vedere che le vincite promesse da questa slot non sono trascurabili.
Il simbolo Bonus, rappresentato dalla navicella spaziale, è uno Scatter. Ovvero è sufficiente trovarne tre in qualsiasi posizione (non è necessario che si trovino sulla stessa linea di vincita) per avere accesso ai giri gratuiti. Durante questa modalità la slot muta e i rulli diventano lunghi il doppio, diventando di fatto una slot di tipo 5*6 che mostra trenta simboli alla volta.
Esistono inoltre diverse funzioni speciali che si innescano più o meno casualmente e che quindi possono rendere il gameplay di questa slot estremamente variegato e divertente da provare.
Slot simili a Little Green Men: Nova Wilds
Il tema dello spazio e dei suoi abitanti è molto utilizzato nel mondo delle slot online, come ad esempio con Star Trek, Star Fall e Book of Stars (alcune tra i molti titoli a disposizione online).

raw_translation.response:
Little Green Men Nova Wilds
The vast expanse of space and its mysteries have always been loved in various media such as books and movies, but they are also taking over the world of slots. In IGT's Little Green Men: Nova Wilds, the theme is that of aliens, especially in their most common representation as little green beings equipped with antennas and on board round spacecraft. This slot stands out particularly for its charm, but let's talk more about it in the first point of our review.

Let's talk about the graphics of Little Green Men: Nova Wilds.
Little Green Men: Nova Wilds - A cartoonish graphics style
Often defining something as a "cartoon" means little serious and too childish, but in reality creating a cartoonish graphics is not an easy task since even in the simplicity of bright colors and round shapes, little gems can be found. And that is the case with Little Green Men: Nova Wilds.

This slot is set in deep space with the profile of a planet in the distance, but the thing that jumps out the most is the complete absence of a real grid. The symbols seem to float in space. The symbols that run on the game grid are sci-fi objects such as hyper-tech helmets, robots, supercomputers, and laser guns.

One appreciable detail is the representation of the typical playing card symbols. If in many other slots these are simply initials (A, K, Q, J) in often somewhat essential fonts, here they are carved like rock on small asteroids. Only this small detail makes Little Green Men: Nova Wilds different from the usual.

Meanwhile, a small green alien with three eyes will accompany us during the game with funny animations that trigger on special combinations.

Fortunately, the sound part is also well-cured. Music and sounds refer to the sci-fi and cartoonish theme of the slot without being annoying. And now let's talk about the more technical aspect of the slot.

Little Green Men: Nova Wilds - Gameplay mechanics
We come, therefore, to the technical aspect of this slot. The mechanism used by this IGT title is common to many other online slots. It is a 5*3 where five reels move along three lines, showing fifteen symbols at each play. There are twenty paylines, and the RTP is 96.17%, a value quite common among the standards not only of this development house but of the market in general. If we consider that the minimum value is 90% and the maximum (which is rarely reached) is 99%, we can see that the winnings promised by this slot are not negligible.

The Bonus symbol, represented by the spaceship, is a Scatter. That is, it is sufficient to find three in any position (it is not necessary for them to be on the same payline) to access the free spins. During this mode, the slot changes, and the reels double in length, becoming a 5*6 type slot that shows thirty symbols at a time.

There are also several special functions that can be triggered more or less randomly and that can, therefore, make the gameplay of this slot extremely varied and fun to try.

Slots similar to Little Green Men: Nova Wilds
The theme of space and its inhabitants is heavily used in the world of online slots, such as Star Trek, Star Fall, and Book of Stars (just a few of the many available titles online).

Review: Little Green Men Nova Wilds
The vast expanse of space and its mysteries have always been loved in various media such as books and movies, but they are also taking over the world of slots. In IGT's Little Green Men: Nova Wilds, the theme is that of aliens, especially in their most common representation as little green beings equipped with antennas and on board round spacecraft. This slot stands out particularly for its charm, but let's talk more about it in the first point of our review.

Let's talk about the graphics of Little Green Men: Nova Wilds.
Little Green Men: Nova Wilds - A cartoonish graphics style
Often defining something as a "cartoon" means little serious and too childish, but in reality creating a cartoonish graphics is not an easy task since even in the simplicity of bright colors and round shapes, little gems can be found. And that is the case with Little Green Men: Nova Wilds.

This slot is set in deep space with the profile of a planet in the distance, but the thing that jumps out the most is the complete absence of a real grid. The symbols seem to float in space. The symbols that run on the game grid are sci-fi objects such as hyper-tech helmets, robots, supercomputers, and laser guns.

One appreciable detail is the representation of the typical playing card symbols. If in many other slots these are simply initials (A, K, Q, J) in often somewhat essential fonts, here they are carved like rock on small asteroids. Only this small detail makes Little Green Men: Nova Wilds different from the usual.

Meanwhile, a small green alien with three eyes will accompany us during the game with funny animations that trigger on special combinations.

Fortunately, the sound part is also well-cured. Music and sounds refer to the sci-fi and cartoonish theme of the slot without being annoying. And now let's talk about the more technical aspect of the slot.

Little Green Men: Nova Wilds - Gameplay mechanics
We come, therefore, to the technical aspect of this slot. The mechanism used by this IGT title is common to many other online slots. It is a 5*3 where five reels move along three lines, showing fifteen symbols at each play. There are twenty paylines, and the RTP is 96.17%, a value quite common among the standards not only of this development house but of the market in general. If we consider that the minimum value is 90% and the maximum (which is rarely reached) is 99%, we can see that the winnings promised by this slot are not negligible.

The Bonus symbol, represented by the spaceship, is a Scatter. That is, it is sufficient to find three in any position (it is not necessary for them to be on the same payline) to access the free spins. During this mode, the slot changes, and the reels double in length, becoming a 5*6 type slot that shows thirty symbols at a time.

There are also several special functions that can be triggered more or less randomly and that can, therefore, make the gameplay of this slot extremely varied and fun to try.
